biotools.summary: Annotated collection of normalized data describing antimicrobial peptides, their sources, their 3D structures, and their target organisms. It enables users to perform quick queries and allows the entire peptide community to contribute to the repository.

bioschemas.name: Antimicrobial Peptide Database (AMPed)
bioschemas.summary: Annotated collection of normalized data describing antimicrobial peptides, their sources, their 3D structures, and their target organisms. It enables users to perform quick queries and allows the entire peptide community to contribute to the repository.
